organization.description: American Cancer Society is the nationwide, community-based, voluntary health organization dedicated to eliminating cancer as a major health problem by preventing cancer, saving lives from cancer, and diminishing suffering from cancer through research, education, advocacy and service.\n\nLa Sociedad Americana del C+íncer es la organizaci+¦n de salud a nivel nacional basada en la comunidad, organizaci+¦n voluntaria dedicada a eliminar el c+íncer como un problema importante de salud mediante la prevenci+¦n del c+íncer, salvar vidas por c+íncer, y la disminuci+¦n del sufrimiento del c+íncer a trav+¬s de la investigaci+¦n, la educaci+¦n, recomendaci+¦n y el servicio.
organization.name: AMERICAN CANCER SOCIETY - DADE UNIT
